issue.title: [Python] Remove unused cmake flag from wheel scripts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7315](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7315). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Saw this while building a wheel locally:

```Java

CMake Warning:
  Manually-specified variables were not used by the project:

    OPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS

```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7315?focusedCommentId=17013740) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
It only affect python 2.7 which we'll drop support for after the next release.
